# mmmTMB

An R package to fit Markov movement models using TMB

## Installation

Installation and use of the `mmmTMB` package requires a [C++ compiler](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200486498-Package-Development-Prerequisites) with `OpenMP` support.

``` r
devtools::install_github("luke-a-rogers/mmmTMB")
```

(Please wait until the first stable release)
